Class HudSettingsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.views.BaseView
      • com.parkingtycoon.views.ui.HudSettingsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Showable

    public class HudSettingsView
extends BaseView
implements Showable
    This class is responsible for showing the settings window.
